song.title: After sunset
song.info:
.. chuck biscuits@kosmic ..
Bringing you down to earth with my longest trk ever :)
Clocking in at 83 1/3 bpm and at just over 20 minutes in length, i hope you enjoy this dub/groove adventure..
Most percussion in this track was sampled and effected by me.
Samples from; roland x0x drumboxes, akai xr-10, the orb (ultraworlds lp), 303, some kurzweil patches, ozone, yamaha tx81z, x14 demotune, etc etc etc.. Inspirations: richard h., kirk & cabaret voltaire, massive attack, paterson, fripp, eno.
Sit back, lie down, immerse yourself, listen, feel, relax, release, enjoy.
Thanks: Basehead for the persuasion, Aaron for the coffee, graham for the attitude and opportunity and marta for the company.
No greets - just grooves :) email: chuckb@autoroute.net
